The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 09 August is 59,903 (6,904.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 August, there were 2,440 new confirmed cases (281.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 July, there were 2,114 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 15% (326 extra cases).
